name: Identification
description: Detect the crime or incident from indicators, anomalies, complaints, system monitoring, audit analysis, or other signs.

name: Preservation
description: Case management, forensic imaging, chain of custody, and time synchronization.

name: Collection
description: Preservation using approved/validated methods, including recovery techniques, lossless compression, data reduction, and sampling.

name: Examination
description: Preservation, traceability, filtering, pattern matching, hidden data discovery, and hidden data extraction.

name: Analysis
description: Preservation, traceability, statistical, protocols, data mining, timeline, link, spacial.

name: Presentation
description: Documentation, expert testimony, clarification, mission impact statement, recommended countermeasures, and statistical interpretation.
